brand.name: Brand
brand.help: The brand is the product's manufacturer, whose name can usually be found on the front of the camera or lens.

model.name: Model
model.help: Camera bodies usually state their model on the front. For lenses you can enter all the text written around the front lens.
model.placeholder: D800, 5D Mark III, 50mm f1.4 AF, SB-900 flash, ...

condition.name: Condition
condition.help: What condition is the product in?

options.perfect: Perfect – The product works without flaws.
options.good: Good – The product has been used, but works as intended.
options.broken: Broken – The product is mainly for spare parts.

images.name: Images
images.help: Add images of your product to help us make a better offer.
